_header: If thou feast him deliciously then he will sleep
_description: The nature of Man — two couplets

HerefordO35.Transcription:
for if þu fest hym deliciously þan he will sclepeif þu
                    ȝefe him defaute þan he will wepeif þu ȝef hym pouerte
                    he con do noteif þu makest hym mak hym rich þan he
                    will doute
